This game is mobile compatible!

You are the Solender, make some friends in space to achieve your goal!
This game was made in about 4 hours for @angesaystruth1 
It features very simple gameplay but no sound.

Controls;

  • WASD/arrow keys: left click: move around
  • F4: Toggle fullscreen (windows only)
